summary: The best plan to defeat Dabi is to bring Rei and make her say "I'm not mad I'm just disappointed" and then you’ll have Dabi...
body: The best plan to defeat Dabi is to bring Rei and make her say “I’m not mad I’m just disappointed” and then you’ll have Dabi ashamed of his life choices while having a breakdown in the arms of his mom.

reblog.comment: The best plan to defeat Dabi is to bring Rei and make her say “I’m not mad I’m just disappointed” and then you’ll have Dabi ashamed of his life choices while having a breakdown in the arms of his mom.

trail.content_raw: The best plan to defeat Dabi is to bring Rei and make her say “I’m not mad I’m just disappointed” and then you’ll have Dabi ashamed of his life choices while having a breakdown in the arms of his mom.
trail.content: The best plan to defeat Dabi is to bring Rei and make her say “I’m not mad I’m just disappointed” and then you’ll have Dabi ashamed of his life choices while having a breakdown in the arms of his mom.

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary: Endeavor : SHOUTO!!! When you tried to take down a hardened criminal with no supervision, I shrugged it off as some hormonal,...
body:
Endeavor : SHOUTO!!! When you tried to take down a hardened criminal with no supervision, I shrugged it off as some hormonal, split-second decision. It almost got you suspended from U.A High... only for you to make the same mistake AGAIN, this time with an entire GANG of terrorists! Why would you endanger your own life so stupidly?
Todoroki Shouto : I dunno... For the flair, I guess? The drama of it all?
Endeavor : [sigh] Shaping you into my image was a mistake.

summary: This project was one of my most ambitious ones yet but I'm so pleased with how it turned out. I'm glad I took the extra time to...
body:
This project was one of my most ambitious ones yet but I’m so pleased with how it turned out. I’m glad I took the extra time to make sure the editing was perfect. I hope you enjoy.

Yes, I am aware that Midoriya isn’t a villain XD this is just playing on an idea.

Cosplay: Maou (he/him)

Filming: Chia (she/her)

Edit: Maou

Software: Filmora

Music: Broken - DNMO, Sub Urban

https://youtu.be/VQquJQ9fKOE

blog.name: daveydesu
blog.title: L'appel Du Vide
blog.description:
Davey || ♋ || Male ||
Gray-Aromantic || ENFP-T

"Actually four possums in a man suit that have somehow figured out how to work a longboard and drawing tablet. "

I'm punk trash from Washington that Cosplays and does Art sometimes.

Dragon Age, Life is Strange, Mystic Messenger and Fallout has taken over my life -- I'm not sorry.

In addition to that, my interests include Longboarding, possums, horror games, Junji Ito, A Lot Like Birds, Pat the Bunny, Folk-punk, whiskey and sad shit.

Sidebar art by
www.endrae.tumblr.com

body:
A love confession

Shouto: I’ve got a crush on you, I hope you feel the way that I do.

Izuku: I think that maybe I’ve always loved you. But you wanna know the other thing that I know for sure? Besides the fact that I love you? I’m always going to love you, no matter what.
